prompt_base: massive muscular alien pirate, teal green skin, wild orange mane-like hair, long beard, fierce expression, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: alien skin texture, extreme muscle definition, individual hair and beard strands, polished heavy gold jewelry texture, weathered fabric weave on clothing, sharp focus, subsurface scattering
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, human skin tone, organic, smooth skin, low quality, blurry face, deformed anatomy, (human face:1.2), too soft, friendly expression
